posts.title: Garden Igloo
posts.content: Create a comfortable outdoor living space you can use year round with the garden igloo. This multipurpose geodesic dome is made from rust-free recyclable materials, making it the ideal place to relax and enjoy nature while taking a break from the elements.

posts.title: Folding Bedside Shelf
posts.content: Stop losing stuff in your giant blackhole of bed sheets by placing your things on this folding bedside shelf. No assembly required – it comes with convenient cord holders along the sides and provides enough space for phones, wallets, and tablets.

posts.title: Mana Energy Drink
posts.content: Keep yourself alert and hydrated like a true gamer as you journey throughout the bowels of Azeroth by consuming the mana energy drink. Packed with more caffeine than two Redbulls, it provides hours of jitter-free energy with no after-crash.

posts.title: High Definition Camera Pen
posts.content: Sharpen your espionage skills by capturing unsuspecting people with the high definition camera pen. This high tech pen features a discrete design that comes with a built in microscopic camera – allowing you to capture some amazing high definition footage.

posts.title: Jabba The Hut Coffee Mug
posts.content: Add a geeky spin to your daily coffee routine by pouring your piping hot brew inside this Jabba The Hut coffee mug. This out-of-this-world mug is microwave-safe and features an XL 26 ounce capacity, which makes it perfect for either beverages or soups.

posts.title: Model 1911 Rubber Band Gun
posts.content: Proclaim yourself sheriff and restore order in the work place by arming yourself with the Model 1911 rubber band gun. This handmade walnut and hard maple semi-automatic piece sports an all-wood construction and can hold and fire up to six rubber bands.

posts.title: Heat Activated Hair Color Kit
posts.content: Instantly transform your look by giving your hair bold colors using this heat activated hair color kit. The dye magically goes from one vibrant hue to another in seconds – allowing you to achieve combinations like cool violet with warm pink, and lime green with yellow.

posts.title: Reusable Campfire In A Can
posts.content: Get a nice roaring fire going in record time by lighting up this reusable campfire in a can. This eco-friendly self-contained campfire can easily be lit and produces no smoky odor, low soot, and embers – making it ideal for the beach, camping, or your backyard.

posts.title: Trailer Hitch Hammock
posts.content: Turn any pit stop along the highway into a secluded relaxation spot with the trailer hitch hammock. Upon hitching it to your truck or RV, you’ll be instantly converting the back of your vehicle into a lounge area where you could kick back and take in the scenery.

posts.title: Reflective Invisible Spray
posts.content: Increase your visibility on the road during night time bike rides by using this reflective invisible spray. This light-reflective spray works on all kinds of fabrics, remains invisible during the day, and will easily wash off with water without damaging your clothes.

posts.title: Two Person Bean Bag Chair
posts.content: Turn your living room into the most comfy place on your block by swapping out your loveseat for this two person bean bag chair. This incredibly comfortable bean bag is filled with shredded memory foam and features a soft double stitched microsuade cover.

posts.title: Emergency Flotation Wristband
posts.content: Minimize the risk of drowning while you’re out on the water by wearing this emergency flotation wristband. Capable of handling a body weight up to 280 pounds, it can instantly inflate a life-saving personal flotation device when you pull the lever.
